name: Espresso
description: A strong and bold coffee made by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans.

name: Americano
description: Espresso diluted with hot water, offering a similar strength to brewed coffee.

name: Cappuccino
description: A creamy blend of espresso, steamed milk, and foam, topped with a sprinkle of cocoa powder.

name: Latte
description: Espresso mixed with steamed milk and a small amount of foam, perfect for a smooth coffee experience.

name: Mocha
description: A rich combination of espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate syrup, topped with whipped cream.

name: Macchiato
description: Espresso with a small amount of steamed milk, offering a strong coffee flavor with a touch of creaminess.

name: Cold Brew
description: Smooth, cold coffee brewed over an extended period for a mellow taste.

name: Croissant
description: Flaky, buttery pastry perfect for pairing with any coffee drink.

name: Chocolate Muffin
description: A rich, chocolatey muffin with chunks of chocolate throughout.

name: Blueberry Scone
description: Tender scone studded with fresh blueberries and a hint of lemon zest.

name: Bagel with Cream Cheese
description: A toasted bagel served with a generous spread of cream cheese.

name: Avocado Toast
description: Toasted bread topped with fresh avocado, sea salt, and a drizzle of olive oil.

name: Breakfast Burrito
description: A hearty burrito filled with scrambled eggs, bacon, cheese, and avocado.

name: Herbal Tea
description: A soothing blend of herbs, perfect for a calming tea break.

name: Green Tea
description: Refreshing green tea with a hint of natural sweetness.

name: Chai Latte
description: Spiced tea combined with steamed milk for a flavorful and aromatic drink.

name: Smoothie
description: A blend of fresh fruits and yogurt for a refreshing and healthy drink.

name: Protein Shake
description: A nutritious shake made with protein powder, milk, and fruits.

name: Iced Coffee
description: Chilled coffee served over ice, perfect for a refreshing pick-me-up.

name: Affogato
description: A scoop of vanilla ice cream 'drowned' in a shot of hot espresso.
